University of Virginia Library’s use policy.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Newsclippings Regarding Cathe Wallendahl, 1956-1959, Accession #9231-aa, University of Virginia Library, Charlottesville, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: This collection was given to the Library by Mr. John D. Forbes of Charlottesville, Virginia on January 6, 1987.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: These four newsclippings from the Sunday Starof Washington, D.C., and the Charlottesville Daily Progress,1956-1959, feature the sculptress Cathe Wallendahl (Mrs. John A. Mowinckel), particularly her work on a bust of James Monroe. The Monroe bust was presented to the University of Virginia in honor of Colgate Darden, Jr., by Mrs. Jennings C. Wise of Charlottesville in December of 1958.
